summary: Collect Dragon bones and scales from burial mounds and craft heart scales at forges.
descriptionHtml:
This mod will allow you to take Dragon bones and scales from burial mounds.  It is a simplified, script free version of my 'Dig Up Dragon Bones and Scales' mod.

If you activate a Dragon burial mound, it will contain one dragon bone and one dragon scale.  The mounds will respawn just like any other container.  There are no clues to their locations, so you must explore and find them on your own.

You can also craft Dragon heart scales at a forge using one Dragon scale.  The recipe will only appear if you have Kahvozein's Fang in your inventory.
author: Thicketford
